row.scheme: ;;;ScoreOpus (if (d-PreviousMovement) (d-WarningDialog "Returning to the first Movement to set this.")) (while (d-PreviousMovement) (display "Seeking first movement")) (SetHeaderField "opus") (DenemoPrintAllHeaders) (d-RefreshDisplay)
row._tooltip: Name of the opus, flush-right below the arranger.
